definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: madness (on txt. v. infr.), only pl. [[הׂלֵלוֹת]], [[הוֹלֵלוֹת]], and only Ec: Ec 1:17 and I set my heart ([[וׇאֶתְּנׇה לִבִּי]]) to know wisdom, and to know madness and folly ([[הׂלֵלוֹת וְשִׂכְלוּת]]), cf. [[הוֹלֵלוֹת]] Ec 2:12 (‖ id.); ´[[וְלָדַעַת רֶשַׁע כֶּסֶל וְהַסִּכְלוּת ה]] Ec 7:25; i.e. to know folly to be madness; possibly rd. [[חוֹלֵלוּת]], cf. [[סִכְלוּת]] & foll.; the moral evil of it is specif. recognized in Ec 9:3 (‖[[רָע]]).
